content:
# Build docker image
## -t flag adds a tag to the image
## -f flag : path to Dockerfile
## the dot at the end indicates the build context (input)
docker build -t my-tag -f tools/deployment/Dockerfile .

# Run docker container
## -p flag is for port LOCALHOST_PORT:EXPOSED_PORT
## --name flag gives container a name
docker run -p 9090:9090 --name my-name my-tag:latest

# You can also use package.json scripts
npm run docker:build
npm run docker:run
